game.name: Egg Chef
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Egg Chef challenges you to cook and deliver eggs for points while avoiding dropping eggs. Play by yourself for a high score or online with friends to see who the best egg chef is. Catch falling Items for a competitive advantage.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Egg Chef challenges you to cook and deliver eggs for points while avoiding dropping eggs. Play by yourself for a high score or online with friends to see who the best egg chef is. Catch falling Items for a competitive advantage.
